abstract: Profile of Sen Mike Lee of Utah, Tea Party member who has upset Democrats by threatening to help shut down government, but who has nevertheless aligned himself with liberal Democrats over Republicans on issues like privacy and criminal justice reform.
lead_paragraph: Mike Lee, the junior senator from Utah who helped lead the government shutdown effort, has a reputation of defying party leaders as well as cooperating with Democrats on libertarian-leaning policy.

headline.main: A Republican Agitator in the Senate Makes Friends Across the Aisle
headline.print_headline: Republican Senator Straddles Fine Line, Shunning Usual Partisan Path

snippet: Mike Lee, the junior senator from Utah who helped lead the government shutdown effort, has a reputation of defying party leaders as well as cooperating with Democrats on libertarian-leaning policy.
